reviewText: Hilarious! absolute fun to watch. Can't wait to get season 4. Mr brown is so funny and the looks on his face during the episode are so funny.
I bought this as a gift for my Mom, and she loves it.  She loves Mr. Brown; his funny clothing, and his wacky personality!
I love this show it allows me to escape and also sometimes has a good message I recommend it to others

Meet the browns is amazing, very, very funny, Tons of laughter, I could watch it over and over again. Great family show and still funnier today.  It is far better than the so called comedy sitcoms currently running.

I love Tyler and this sitcom is one of his best especially Mr. Brown. This is hilarious and also with a great storylines

I purchased the entire season for my husband and myself because we have never seen the show on television. We watched Season 1 and if the others are anything like Season 1, we are in for smiles, belly laughs, and thigh slapping enjoyment!!!!!!!!!! We love the works of Tyler Perry, have all of his plays/movies and now we are starting with his TV shows.
I just love it!! Tyler Perry is great at writing exciting work; as well as choosing awesome actors, to present his work. Well done!
Like the other shows, there are serious issues and funny parts (mostly played by Brown). The price is nice and I love the shows.

They always advertise the DVD with the sleeve and then you receive cheap no sleeve DVD. That's real upsetting. Amazon should be ashamed of this false advertising. I'm tired of this. Then there is no way to let them know that you want the sleeve to be sent. Buyers beware.
I love the move the Browns, it is great to have a move i can relate too, we need more.
This series is a very funny show in which Tyler Perry shows his talent. Well worth the money,good,clean,fun family entertainment.

This series is something I never watched when it was still aired. I bought 3 seasons just to be sure I'd get one specific episode. I'm glad that I did buy them because they've brought hours of enjoyment for my family. My grandparents absolutely love Tyler Perry's awesome foolishness. I'm buying them all!
I enjoy it so much I purchased ALL the seasons. It does not get boring with Mr. Brown. He's hilarious!

You must see my review on " Tyler Perry's House of Payne complete series 1-8 ". (copy and paste title to in Amazon's search box).
I spilled my heart out writing that review of Tyler Perry shows, movies and plays. There are people who don't understand how this television show, Meet The Browns and all Tyler Perry productions, mimics a very funny, people of Color television show, from the 50's. Back then, organizations  fought to get it off the air because of stereo typing, yet today we seem to have revive that genre and loving it.
Great show, fun to watch! They are so Funny, and I do not know why they stopped! I would Love to watch more!!
This show is so funny. When i find myself feeling bummed i just pop this in the dvd player and set back for a ton of laughs and my mood changes in no time...
great movie, Mr. Brown is a very good actor and he keeps you on your toes, if you pause, you're going to miss somethig!
I like this show, it keeps you laughing.  David Mann over acts with the Mr. Brown, even though he is sometimes funny.  The role of Renee is stereotypical.  Overall, it is more funny than not.

One of my favorite seasons, of this show!  The story lines were quite entertaining and I can't get through an episode without laughing, like crazy.  It's a really funny show.  I have to shout out my girl, "Terry Vaughn", who played "Renee".  I loved her on the "Steve Harvey Show", as "Lovita"  and I loved her on "Meet The Browns" as "Renee".  The entire cast, was great!  There was never a boring episode.  Thanks, so much, Tyler Perry and TBS!
So funny!!
